eeta amatharawa ape asalwasi indiyawatada wishala islamiya balapamak athi karamin 1526–1737 athara kalaye wasara 200 ka pamana kalayak mogal adhirajya pawathuna athara yuropiya aakramanawalata indiyawa ha lankawa nathunowennata owunge balma lankawatada ella wennata ida thibuna.

eeta amatharawa hitapu rajya amathyawariya, aandukrama wyawasthawe 157 (aa) waganthiya ullanganaya kara athi athara, ee sambandhayen da abhiyachanadhikaranayata adhichodana pathra gonu karana lesa polispathiwarayata niyoga kara thibenawa.

hithawath dinesh,kalin komentuwa damu anonimasaya mamawemi.kalakata ihatha wishesha balakayaka sewaya kalemi.sewaye di sitiyadi siduwu barapathala bomba pipurumak nisa ma samaga siti boho denek miyagiya athara ma hata barapathala thuwala laba jiwath wimata ida labuni.namuth ma sadahatama aabaditha bawata path wini.mage wayasa awrudu25 di sewayen wishrama labu athara.ihatha anathura siduwi wasara 12 pamana gathawi atha.dan ma itha aprakatawa siya kamaththen hudakala jiwithayak gatha karami.honda chithrapata,poth path,soba dahama mage mithuran wi atha.mage adahasa nam oonama hamudawak yudamaya washayen sarthaka wimata nam wishishta puhunuwa menma dhanathmaka aramunakda thibiya yuthu bawayi.amarikanu hamudawan afganisthanayedi boho wita asarthaka wanne owunata me aramuna nomathi nisa weni.ma aramuna yayi adahas kale meyayi.thama ratin sathapum dahas gananak aatha athi rataka wesena dilidu minisun samuhayakata thaman erahi wanne ayidayi owunata sithenawa wennata puluwana.ape rate hamudawanta meyata wenaswa yudamaya lesa dhanathmaka aramunak thibuni wasara gananawak thaman athulu ratawasiyan pelu wipathin galawimata ownata awasiwa thibuni.me nisa yuddhaya awasan kirima wenuwen hama sebalekutama pudgalika aramunak thibuni.ape rate yuddaya sarthaka wimata hethuwa wuwe meyayi.
